title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Last Updated: December 2025


Praevius (“we”, “our”, “us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use praevius.app.






Account Information: Name, email address, company name, job title
Billing Information: Payment details (processed securely via Stripe)
Project Data: Cost data, budgets, variations, and other construction information you enter
Communications: Messages, support requests, and feedback





Usage Data: Features used, pages visited, time spent
Device Information: Browser type, operating system, device type
Log Data: IP address, access times, referral URLs





We use your information to:

Provide and improve our services
Process payments and manage subscriptions
Send service-related communications
Provide customer support
Analyse usage patterns to improve the platform
Comply with legal obligations




We implement industry-standard security measures including:

Encryption in transit (TLS 1.3)
Encryption at rest (AES-256)
Regular security audits
Access controls and authentication
Secure data centres (EU/UK based)




We retain your data for as long as your account is active. Upon account deletion:

Account data: Deleted within 30 days
Backup data: Deleted within 90 days
Anonymised analytics: May be retained indefinitely




Under GDPR and UK Data Protection Act 2018, you have the right to:

Access your personal data
Rectify inaccurate data
Erase your data (“right to be forgotten”)
Restrict processing
Data portability
Object to processing

To exercise these rights, contact us at info@praevius.app.



We use the following third-party services:

Stripe: Payment processing
AWS/GCP: Cloud infrastructure
Analytics: Usage analytics (anonymised)




We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. Optional analytics cookies require your consent.



We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated via email or in-app notification.



For privacy-related questions:
Email: info@praevius.app

Praevius is part of the BIM Takeoff ecosystem.

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
Last Updated: December 2025


By accessing or using Praevius (praevius.app), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.



Praevius is a cloud-based cost control platform for construction professionals. The service includes:

Real-time budget tracking
AI-powered reporting
Variance analysis
Integration with third-party services
Data storage and export





You must be 18 years or older to use this service
You must provide accurate and complete information
You are responsible for maintaining account security
One person or legal entity per account
You may not use the service for illegal purposes





Prices are in USD unless otherwise stated
Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually
Payment is due at the start of each billing period
Refunds are available within 30 days of initial purchase
We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days notice





You retain ownership of all data you input into Praevius
You grant us license to process your data to provide the service
We may use anonymised, aggregated data for analytics
You can export your data at any time
Upon account termination, your data will be deleted per our Privacy Policy




You agree not to:

Violate any laws or regulations
Upload malicious code or attempt to breach security
Resell or redistribute the service without permission
Use automated systems to access the service beyond normal usage
Interfere with other users’ access to the service





Praevius and its content are protected by copyright and trademark
You may not copy, modify, or distribute our software
Feedback you provide may be used to improve the service





We provide integrations with third-party services (Xero, QuickBooks, etc.)
These integrations are subject to their own terms of service
We are not responsible for third-party service availability or changes




THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED “AS IS” WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE:

Uninterrupted or error-free service
Accuracy of AI-generated reports
Compatibility with all systems
That the service will meet all your requirements




TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, PRAEVIUS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:

Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
Damages exceeding the amount paid in the preceding 12 months




You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Praevius from any claims arising from your use of the service or violation of these terms.



We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance. Material changes will be communicated via email.




You may cancel your subscription at any time
We may terminate accounts for violation of these terms
Upon termination, your access will end and data will be deleted per our retention policy




These terms are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Disputes shall be resolved in the courts of England and Wales.



For questions about these terms:
Email: info@praevius.app

Praevius is part of the BIM Takeoff ecosystem.

title: Praevius | AI-Powered Cost Control for Construction
text:
See costs before they spiral

AI-powered cost control for construction subcontractors and QS firms.Professional-grade insights without enterprise complexity.


 Start Free Trial See How It Works








The Cost Overrun Crisis




 88% Error Rate


Construction spreadsheets contain costly errors. Manual tracking means missed variances and budget overruns discovered too late.




 Hours Wasted


Billing cycles require hunting through spreadsheets and PDFs, re-keying numbers, comparing line items manually.




 Cash Flow Blind


Only 12% of contractors get paid on time. Without real-time visibility, you’re always reacting, never anticipating.









Proactive Intelligence


Praevius (from Latin “going before”) anticipates cost problems before they escalate. Connect your data once, get insights forever.




 Real-Time Tracking


Budget vs. actual at a glance. Know your cost performance index the moment it changes.




 AI-Powered Reports


Generate variance reports in 2 minutes instead of 2 hours. AI identifies anomalies before they become problems.




 S-Curve Forecasting


See where your project is headed, not just where it’s been. EVM precision meets construction practicality.




 Seamless Integrations


Connect to Xero, QuickBooks, Sage, Google Drive, SharePoint—even sync with Procore for GC collaboration.




 Mobile Ready


Update costs from the field. Approve variations on site. Real construction happens beyond the office.




 Voice Input


Coming soon: Speak your progress, let AI do the data entry. Built for noisy jobsites and multilingual crews.









Built for Your Business




 Trade Contractors


Electrical, mechanical, plumbing specialists with 10-50 employees. You need cost control that understands your world—variations, retainage, progress claims.




 QS Professionals


Growing quantity surveying practices serving multiple clients. Professional tools that scale with your workload without enterprise complexity.









Simple, Transparent Pricing


Start free, upgrade as you grow. No per-user fees, no hidden costs.




Free


Free



✓ Up to 3 projects


✓ 1 team member


✓ Core cost tracking


Start Free



Essential


$99/month



✓ Up to 10 projects


✓ Up to 3 team members


✓ Google Drive Sync


✓ 1 accounting integration


Start Free Trial



Professional


$229/month



✓ Up to 25 projects


✓ Up to 10 team members


✓ All integrations


✓ Claude AI Reports


Start Free Trial



Scale


$449/month



✓ Unlimited projects


✓ Unlimited team members


✓ Claude AI Reports


✓ Procore ↔︎ SharePoint Sync


Start Free Trial








Ready to See Costs Before They Spiral?


Start your free trial today. Experience AI-powered cost control built specifically for construction professionals.


 Start Free Trial

30-day free trial. No credit card required.








Praevius is the cost control intelligence layer of the BIM Takeoff ecosystem. 20 years of construction expertise, now powered by AI.

title: Features | Praevius
text:
Everything You Need to Control Costs

From real-time tracking to AI-powered forecasting. One platform, complete visibility.







Core Capabilities




 Real-Time Budget Tracking


See your budget vs. actual costs the moment data changes. No more waiting for month-end reports to discover problems. Dashboard views show project health at a glance with traffic-light status indicators.



Live cost performance index (CPI)


Budget consumption tracking


Variance alerts and thresholds


Multi-project portfolio view





 AI-Powered Reporting


Generate professional variance reports in minutes, not hours. Our AI analyzes patterns, identifies anomalies, and explains the “why” behind your numbers in plain English.



Automated variance explanations


Trend analysis and forecasting


Executive summary generation


Export to PDF, Word, or share live





 S-Curve Forecasting


Earned Value Management made practical. See where your project is headed, not just where it’s been. Plan interventions before problems escalate.



Planned vs. actual vs. forecast curves


Schedule Performance Index (SPI)


Estimate at Completion (EAC) projections


What-if scenario modeling





 Change Order Management


Track every variation from inception to approval to payment. Never leave money on the table again. Change orders account for 8-14% of project costs—capture them all.



Variation register with status tracking


Automated entitlement flagging


Impact assessment tools


Approval workflow automation





 Progress Claim Automation


Generate accurate progress claims in minutes. Centralized dashboard eliminates hunting through spreadsheets and rechecking every line item manually.



Schedule of values tracking


Percentage complete calculations


Retainage management


Claim history and audit trail





 Seamless Integrations


Connect to the tools you already use. Praevius syncs with accounting, storage, and project management platforms for a single source of truth.



Xero, QuickBooks, Sage


Google Drive, SharePoint, OneDrive


Procore (for GC collaboration)


Open API for custom connections










Coming Soon




 Voice Input


Speak your progress, let AI handle data entry. Built for noisy jobsites, accented speech, and multilingual crews. Field teams will actually use it.




 Native Mobile App


Beyond responsive web—a true native experience. Offline capability, camera integration for documentation, push notifications for approvals.




 Predictive Analytics


AI that learns from your historical data to predict likely cost overruns before they happen. Early warning, not post-mortem.









Industry-Standard Variance Indicators


Instant project health visibility using the traffic light system every construction professional understands.



 On Budget

Variance within ±5%. Project performing as planned. Continue current trajectory.



 Watch

Variance 5-10%. Early warning. Investigate and plan corrective action.



 Over Budget

Variance exceeds 10%. Immediate attention required. Intervention needed.









Ready to Take Control?


Start your free trial and experience all features.

 Start Free Trial

title: Pricing | Praevius
text:
Simple, Transparent Pricing

Professional-grade tools. Mid-market pricing. No surprises.










Free


Get started with basic cost tracking at no cost.


Free



✓ Up to 3 projects


✓ 1 team member


✓ Core cost tracking


✓ Community support


Start Free




Essential


For small trade contractors getting started with digital cost control.


$99/month



✓ Up to 10 projects


✓ Up to 3 team members


✓ Cost Control


✓ Google Drive Sync


✓ SharePoint Document Sync


✓ 1 accounting integration (Xero Invoicing, QuickBooks Online, or Sage Intacct)


Start Free Trial




POPULAR


Professional


For growing contractors and QS practices who need full automation.


$229/month



✓ Up to 25 projects


✓ Up to 10 team members


✓ Cost Control


✓ Google Drive Sync


✓ Xero Invoicing


✓ QuickBooks Online


✓ Sage Intacct


✓ SharePoint Document Sync


✓ Claude AI Reports


Start Free Trial




Scale


For multi-project operations needing unlimited capacity.


$449/month



✓ Unlimited projects


✓ Unlimited team members


✓ Cost Control


✓ Google Drive Sync


✓ Xero Invoicing


✓ QuickBooks Online


✓ Sage Intacct


✓ SharePoint Document Sync


✓ Claude AI Reports


✓ Procore ↔︎ SharePoint Sync


Start Free Trial








Frequently Asked




Is there a free plan?


Yes! Our Free plan lets you track up to 3 projects with 1 team member. Upgrade anytime as your needs grow.




Are there any per-user fees?


No. Each plan includes a set number of users, and our Scale plan includes unlimited users. No hidden per-seat charges.




Can I change plans later?


Absolutely. Upgrade or downgrade anytime. Changes take effect immediately, with prorated billing adjustments.




What about annual billing?


Pay annually and save 17%. Contact us for annual billing options.




What’s included in support?


Essential: Email support (48hr response). Professional: Priority email (24hr response). Scale: Dedicated success manager + phone support.









Need Enterprise Features?


Large subcontractors and QS firms with complex requirements can discuss custom plans including SSO, advanced security, custom integrations, and SLA guarantees.

Talk to Sales






30-Day Money Back Guarantee


If Praevius doesn’t save you time and money in your first month, we’ll refund your payment. No questions asked. We’re that confident.

 Start Free Trial

title: About | Praevius
text:
Built by Practitioners, for Practitioners

20 years of construction cost management expertise, now powered by AI.







The Story



Praevius (from Latin “praevius” meaning “going before”) was born from a simple observation: construction subcontractors are drowning in spreadsheets while enterprise platforms price them out of modern cost control.


After two decades working as a quantity surveyor across the UK, Australia, and Poland—handling everything from £500K fitouts to £50M commercial developments—the pattern became undeniable. Specialty trade contractors, the backbone of every construction project, were consistently:



Losing 3-5% margins to poor variation tracking


Wasting 10+ hours monthly on manual billing cycles


Discovering cost overruns weeks after they could have acted


Being priced out of tools designed for general contractors



Praevius is the solution: professional-grade cost control without enterprise complexity. Simple enough to learn in hours, powerful enough to replace spreadsheet chaos.








Our Philosophy




 Proactive, Not Reactive


The best cost control happens before problems arise. Praevius anticipates variances, flags anomalies, and surfaces insights—so you can act, not just react.




 Built for Construction


Not accounting software with construction labels. Every feature designed around real QS workflows: progress claims, variations, retainage, percentage complete.




 AI as Assistant


AI enhances your expertise, it doesn’t replace it. Specific, measurable outcomes—not vague promises. You make the decisions; Praevius handles the grunt work.









Part of BIM Takeoff




 BIM Takeoff


Professional BIM 5D cost estimation and quantity surveying services. 20 years of international experience across UK, Australia, and Poland. Delivering quantity takeoffs with ±5% accuracy in 3-10 days.

Visit BIM Takeoff →



 Praevius.app


The cost control intelligence layer. Where BIM Takeoff delivers project-specific expertise, Praevius provides the ongoing visibility and control that keeps projects profitable.

Start Free Trial →








Ready to Work Smarter?


Start your free trial today. Experience construction cost control done right.

 Start Free Trial
